CustomField.formula: IF( OR(ISNULL(MUSW__Issued_Number__c), MUSW__Issued_Number__c = "") ,HYPERLINK("../"&Id, Name, "_parent")& " " & HYPERLINK("/servlet/servlet.Integration?lid=01NF00000011RbY&Id=" & Id & "&ic=1&object=MUSW__Application2__c&setStatus=Issued&statusField=MUSW__Status__c&type="& TEXT(MUSW__Type__c)&"&year="& TEXT(YEAR(TODAY()))&"&month="& TEXT(MONTH(TODAY()))&"&day="& TEXT(DAY(TODAY())), "(Issue)", "_parent"),HYPERLINK( "../"&Id , Name,"_parent" ) )
CustomField.label: Issue Number
